appetizers.name: Dabeli
appetizers.description: Battered bite size cauliflower pieces cooked in a sweet and sour sauce topped with scallions.

appetizers.name: Chicken Seekh Kabob
appetizers.description: Minced chicken lightly spiced cooked in the tandoor oven.

entrees.name: Bharwa Mirch
entrees.description: Green peppers stuffed with mix of paneer, potato and spices topped with tikka masala sauce

entrees.name: Chicken Tikka Saag
entrees.description: Boneless pieces of chicken tikka, cooked with spinach and a touch of garlic.

entrees.name: Shrimp Poriyal
entrees.description: Shrimp, cabbage, yellow lentils, mustard seeds, curry leaves light spices.
